title: Use uploaded logo in header (left) at medium size

requirements.summary: Add uploaded logo image to frontend static assets so it can be served by URL at runtime.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting `/assets/generated/image-4.png` in the running app returns the image.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image file (image-4.png) to the generated public assets folder so it is served at runtime via `/assets/generated/image-4.png`.

requirements.summary: Replace the header logo with the uploaded image and reduce its size to a medium height while preserving aspect ratio and existing click navigation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The header renders the logo on the left and it remains clickable (retains existing navigation behavior).
The logo uses `src="/assets/generated/image-4.png"` and does not appear stretched or cropped.
On mobile and desktop, the logo height is visibly reduced to a medium size compared to the current header logo sizing, without causing header layout overlap with the center CTA or right-side actions.

file_operations.description: Update the existing left-side header logo to use `src="/assets/generated/image-4.png"`, keep `w-auto` + `object-contain` to preserve aspect ratio, and adjust Tailwind height classes to a medium size smaller than the current `h-16 sm:h-20 md:h-24` (without changing the logo click handler, auth logic, or routing behavior).
